mapper.select: select t.* from t_xf t where t.yxbz='1' and t.id in (select a.xfid from t_skp a where a.kpddm =#{kpddm} and a.gsdm =#{gsdm} ) LIMIT 1
select t.* from t_xf t where t.yxbz='1' and t.xfsh =#{xfsh} and t.gsdm =#{gsdm} LIMIT 1
select t.* from t_skp t where t.yxbz='1' and t.xfid =#{xfid} and t.gsdm =#{gsdm} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_jyxxsq (kpddm, jylsh, ddrq, ddh, fpzldm, fpczlxdm, xfid, xfsh, xfmc, xfyh, xfyhzh, xflxr, xfdz, xfdh, xfyb, gfid, gfsh, gfmc, gfyh, gfyhzh, gflxr, gfdz, gfdh, gfyb, gfemail, sffsyj, clztdm, bz, skr, kpr, fhr, sfcp, sfdyqd, zsfs, ssyf, hztzdh, yfpdm, yfphm, hsbz, jshj, ykpjshj, yxbz, lrsj, lrry, xgsj, xgry, gfsjr, gfsjrdz, gsdm, tqm, skpid, gfsjh, dxzt,sjly,sfzlkp,sfdy,ztbz,khh,openid) VALUES (#{kpddm}, #{jylsh}, #{ddrq}, #{ddh}, #{fpzldm}, #{fpczlxdm}, #{xfid}, #{xfsh}, #{xfmc}, #{xfyh}, #{xfyhzh}, #{xflxr}, #{xfdz}, #{xfdh}, #{xfyb}, #{gfid}, #{gfsh}, #{gfmc}, #{gfyh}, #{gfyhzh},#{gflxr}, #{gfdz}, #{gfdh}, #{gfyb}, #{gfemail}, #{sffsyj}, #{clztdm}, #{bz}, #{skr}, #{kpr}, #{fhr}, #{sfcp}, #{sfdyqd}, #{zsfs}, #{ssyf}, #{hztzdh}, #{yfpdm}, #{yfphm}, #{hsbz}, #{jshj}, #{ykpjshj}, #{yxbz}, #{lrsj}, #{lrry}, #{xgsj}, #{xgry}, #{gfsjr}, #{gfsjrdz}, #{gsdm}, #{tqm}, #{skpid},#{gfsjh},#{dxzt},#{sjly},#{sfzlkp},#{sfdy},#{ztbz},#{khh},#{openid})

insert into t_jyxxsq (kpddm, jylsh, ddrq, ddh, fpzldm, fpczlxdm, xfid, xfsh, xfmc, xfyh, xfyhzh, xflxr, xfdz, xfdh, xfyb, gfid, gfsh, gfmc, gfyh, gfyhzh, gflxr, gfdz, gfdh, gfyb, gfemail, sffsyj, clztdm, bz, skr, kpr, fhr, sfcp, sfdyqd, zsfs, ssyf, hztzdh, yfpdm, yfphm, hsbz, jshj, ykpjshj, yxbz, lrsj, lrry, xgsj, xgry, gfsjr, gfsjrdz, gsdm, tqm, skpid, gfsjh, dxzt,sjly,sfzlkp,sfdy,ztbz,khh,openid,qjzk) values
(#{item.kpddm},#{item.jylsh},#{item.ddrq},#{item.ddh},#{item.fpzldm},#{item.fpczlxdm}, #{item.xfid},#{item.xfsh},#{item.xfmc},#{item.xfyh},#{item.xfyhzh}, #{item.xflxr},#{item.xfdz},#{item.xfdh},#{item.xfyb},#{item.gfid}, #{item.gfsh},#{item.gfmc},#{item.gfyh},#{item.gfyhzh},#{item.gflxr}, #{item.gfdz},#{item.gfdh},#{item.gfyb},#{item.gfemail},#{item.sffsyj}, #{item.clztdm},#{item.bz},#{item.skr},#{item.kpr},#{item.fhr}, #{item.sfcp},#{item.sfdyqd},#{item.zsfs},#{item.ssyf},#{item.hztzdh}, #{item.yfpdm},#{item.yfphm},#{item.hsbz},#{item.jshj},#{item.ykpjshj}, #{item.yxbz},#{item.lrsj},#{item.lrry},#{item.xgsj},#{item.xgry}, #{item.gfsjr},#{item.gfsjrdz},#{item.gsdm},#{item.tqm},#{item.skpid}, #{item.gfsjh},#{item.dxzt},#{item.sjly},#{item.sfzlkp},#{item.sfdy},#{item.ztbz} ,#{item.khh},#{item.openid},#{item.qjzk})
